action_data.action_text: Gain +2 CLOSE and +2 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Gain +3 CLOSE and +5 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Gain +4 CLOSE and +7 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Gain +5 CLOSE and +12 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Gain +2 FAR and +2 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Gain +3 FAR and +5 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Gain +4 FAR and +7 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Gain +5 FAR and +12 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Gain +2 CLOSE, +2 FAR and +5 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Gain +3 CLOSE, +3 FAR and +7 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Immediately gain +1 AP.
Gain the Focused Condition.
Clear 1 Condition currently affecting you (except for Hooked and Hover) OR gain the Stalwart Condition.
Gain the Berserk Condition.

frenzy_sac.name: Frenzy Sac
frenzy_sac.extra_rules: When this Internal is destroyed you gain the Frenzy Condition. If you would also be destroyed you first resolve the Frenzy Condition and are then destroyed.

action_data.action_text: Gain the Hover Condition.
You and up to two target Allies gain the Focused Condition.
Until the start of your next turn you benefit from Hard Cover. Actors still ignore this benefit for being in Range 2.

camouflage.name: Camouflage
camouflage.extra_rules: You benefit from Hard Cover until the start of your first turn. Actors still ignore this benefit for being in Range 2.

restorator.name: Restorator
restorator.extra_rules: At the start of your turn you may remove 1 Marked Damage from one of your non-Mitigation Internals.

regeneration_organ.name: Regeneration Organ
regeneration_organ.extra_rules: At the end of your turn, if this Internal is not destroyed automatically remove all damage from it.

action_data.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Pushed 1 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Pushed 1 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Pushed 1 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Pushed 2 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Restrained 1 and Slowed 1 Conditions.
On a hit the target gains the Restrained 2 and Slowed 2 Conditions.
On a hit the target gains the Dazed 1 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Pushed 3 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Restrained 1 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Dazed 1 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Fatigued 2 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Pushed 4 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Pulled 4 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Dazed 1 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Drained 1 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Restrained 2 and Slowed 2 Conditions.
On a hit the target gains the Blind Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Burdened 3 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Fatigued 3 Condition and you may remove one of their Conditions.
On a hit the target gains the Doomed 2 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Frenzy Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Jammed Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Dazed 3 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Restrained 3 Condition.
Immediately gain +3 AP. After your turn ends you immediately gain the Drained 3 Condition.
Choose one of your Weapon Internals, it gains the Rapid Fire 2 Tag until the end of this turn. If it already has the Rapid Fire tag it adds +1 to the tag.
You and up to two target Allies may immediately move up to 2 spaces.
You and up to two target Allies gain the Quickened 3 Condition.

ascended_form.name: Ascended Form
ascended_form.extra_rules: You know all Deep Words, except for the Final Word. You may voice up to three of them on your turn ignoring the Fathomless Tag. They deal [1] Marble damage if they are Mental attacks.

action_data.action_text: Adjacent Fishers gain the Fatigued 2 Condition.

feelers.name: Feelers
feelers.extra_rules: Your FAR weapons gain the Point Blank Tag unless they already have them.

depth_charge.name: Depth Charge
depth_charge.extra_rules: You automatically fail all Kill Checks. When you are destroyed, you explode and all actors in Range 3 take [3] damage.

action_data.action_text: Gain the Ironclad 2 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Slowed 3 Condition.
On a hit the target gains the Restrained 3, Fatigued 3 and Doomed 3 Conditions.
The Blast of this attack may include yourself and other Allies, it does not make attacks against either.
